TopicTitle: A bunch of support vehicles (all stock except for BD-armoury)

Articles.Content:
So here is the third and final part of my big post, the support vehicles. In the first part i did the KTT-723 Mammut tank transporter and in the second part i did the combat vehicles.

So now its time to show off the guys who will always be there to give a little helping hand even when things get a little rough. These units are mostly seen in the rear lines tough since they cant protect themselfs from enemys.

Here are the three support vehicles.

K114-B Radstat. our mobile radar station for detectin enemys and using that information to help our AA-tanks and artillery units to work with better efficiency. Its just an APC with a radar on the roof and a mast at the back.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gkp9t5eiittyf9q/K114-B%20Radstat.craft?dl=0

KS116 Hauler. you general purpouse supply truck for giving out fuel, ammo and spareparts to troops and vehicles on the front.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0y83w1lq9699h2z/KS-116%20Hauler.craft?dl=0

KS117 Skycrasher. A mobile missile launch platform for taking out anything they can throw at us from a very long range.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/iqdqujpvdiytr3r/KS-117%20skycrasher.craft?dl=0

Here are some picks of them in action.

"Tune in to the enemy" (Chinas radar truck from C&C Generals Zero hour).

"Fuel, ammo, spare parts, anything you want" (British and US supply vehicles from Wargame airland battle).

"Look at my beautiful weapon" (Scud launcher from C&C Generals).

"Ready for launch" (V-3 laucher from Red alert 2).

There you have it folks, a bunch of support vehicles from my collection .

Mods used: BD-armoury

I hope you enjoy these little creations of mine .

Part 1:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/137915-KTT-723-Mammut-tank-transporter

Part 2:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/137946-A-bunch-of-combat-vehicles

Edited October 30, 2015 by kapteenipirk
